content: fingerless gloves you need g/6 - 4 25mm size 3 yarn approx 160-179 yards 6 stitch markers yarn needle abbreviations chain - chain chain space - chain space slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet blo - back loop only 3rd loop the 3rd loop is located on the backside of a half_double_crochet stitch by working into the 3rd loop it pushes the v on top of the stitch forward creating a raised stripe cuff ribbing leave a long tail 5-7 in you ll need this later row 1 chain 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain turn 8 row 2 chain 1 single_crochet blo 8 times turn 8 row 3 - 30 repeat row 2 until the end of row 30 cuff should measure about 6 in unstretched do not cut your yarn with the long tail you left at the beginning of this project and a yarn needle whip stitch the ends together and weave in the tail left glove start each row by putting first single_crochet double_crochet or half_double_crochet in same stitch as chain row 1 chain 1 single_crochet around top of ribbing evenly you should end up with 32 single_crochet join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch 32 row 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 32 row 3 chain 2 double_crochet around in 3rd loop join with slip_stitch 32 row 4 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 32 row 5 chain 2 double_crochet around in 3rd loop join with slip_stitch 32 pattern and photos ©2020 sarah heaney - lillith creations fingerless gloves row 6 chain 1 half_double_crochet 6 times 2 half_double_crochet in 7th st *place stitch marker between 2 half_double_crochet * half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 33 row 7 chain 1 half_double_crochet 7 times 2 half_double_crochet at stitch marker from previous row move stitch marker up half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with slip_stitch 34 row 8 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 34 row 9 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 34 row 10 chain 2 double_crochet around in 3rd loop join with slip_stitch 34 row 11 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 34 *place stitch marker in 7th half_double_crochet and 15th half_double_crochet from beginning of row * row 12 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop to first stitch marker chain 6 half_double_crochet in 3rd loop at next stitch marker half_double_crochet in 3rd loop around and join with slip_stitch 33 row 13 chain 1 half_double_crochet to chain space 6 half_double_crochet over chain space half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 33 row 14 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 33 row 15 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 33 row 16 chain 1 half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 33 row 17 single_crochet around in 3rd loop fasten_off weave in end 33 right glove copy left glove except - ​ ​ row 6 chain 1 half_double_crochet 26 times 2 half_double_crochet in 27th st *place stitch marker between 2 half_double_crochet
